attributes.action: bring to justice those responsible for poor lending decisions who have been paid millions in salaries and bonuses rather than bailing out the companies with public money and agreeing to the creation of superbanks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Banks, mortgage companies and load companies have made mistakes.
They are being bailed out by the government through everyday citizens paying taxes.  yet the executives continue to live in the lap of luxury!
